It might be better to signal that with
```suggestion
TObjectDrawable::TObjectDrawable(unique_ptr<TObject> obj) : RDrawable(DetectCssType(obj))
```
which you can then convert to a `shared_ptr`. But as internally you use `shared_ptr` anyway, maybe expose that in the interface?
```suggestion
TObjectDrawable::TObjectDrawable(shared_pt<TObject> obj) : RDrawable(DetectCssType(obj))
```
